text: I wanted to extend my heartfelt gratitude for the outstanding customer service by staff Affilah at kinex mall. Her exceptional attention to detail and dedication to meeting customer needs are truly remarkable. Her ability to listen attentively, offer valuable suggestions, and ensure a seamless shopping experience is truly commendable. In fact, I'm just looking for anti-itch cream only. It's evident that she is genuinely care about me and other customers. Thank you for your hard work and for being such a valuable asset to the team. Hope to see you again.üòÅ
Usual Guardian but difficult to find because the floor and shop # wasn't provided in Google Maps and the mall has no obvious floor directory, so had to walk around until found on B1-19

There is a really friendly aunty working there. Asked her for a good dry skin cream recommendation as I was recovering from eczema & she led me to the lane which sold the Suu Balm in which I bought. I didn't get her name but she is a bespectacled lady. This feedback is for her üòä
